overview: Hollywood Hills California, fast cars, fast girls and fast times. Now all of that is going to change. Laura Drake is the new girl in town. She has no parents, and no friends. Of all the boys, Laura sets her sights on on Mike. Mike Miller is a loner, a nerd, someone no one paid attention to until Laura entered his life. Now anyone who bothers Mike has to face the wrath of Laura...
title: Hollywood Hills 90028
